remarks: Define the class of all Neighbors of a vertex in a graph.  The neighbors of a vertex are all vertices which are connected with this vertex by an edge.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens and Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2017.)
statement:
df-nbgra $p |- Neighbors = ( g e. _V , k e. ( 1st ` g ) |-> { n e. ( 1st ` g ) | { k , n } e. ran ( 2nd ` g ) } ) $.
$d g k n $.
